Header: Mother and Daughter nabbed for Trafficking Ganja
Content: The Special Narcotics Raid Unit of Tangalle has seized a mother and daughter engaged in Ganja trafficking in Walawwatta, Ambalantota. The women aged 41 and 59 have been arrested by the aid of a special undercover agent sent by the police. The 59 year-old mother has been charged for the same offense 12 times prior to this.
